page.title: Android Pills
page.text: You can find every Pill inside a dungeon. The possibility to find one is 5%.

page.title: Red Pill
page.text: Swallow the Red Pill and you become an Android. You can also search in villages for the Mad Scientist to become an Android. But for that you have to collect a full android set.

page.title: Blue Pill
page.text: Swallow the Blue Pill and you will be a normal player again. You will lose all your abilities. You can Also get a Blue Pill when you get transformed to an android by a Mad Scientist.

page.title: Yellow Pill
page.text: Swallow the Yellow Pill to reset your android abilities and get back your used xp and items.
